page.title: 18Transport in March
page.content: Most people rely on{public transport. The{station}is vital to the town. {Trains}are used for{children}attending public schools in Ely and Cambridge as well as{people working daily}in Peterborough. Also many{shoppers}go to Peterborough. Many{goods}are delivered by train. { Cambus}operate{public bus services}to such places as Chatteris,Peterborough, Cambridge and Ely.{Emblings coaches operate services to the{villages}round about. Bus services are not very frequent.{Private coach firms}are used to bring children from outlying farms and villages into school each day. { Cycles}are used a lot in March as it is such a{flat}area. This is not an ideal area for large {lorries}as there are no{motorways}and the roads are very{bumpy}due to the {peat shrinkage}beneath them.
